Nightlight::

Nightlight ran towards cr's inside the base and  glenty she l=
eft Trinity in one  "all will be ok, Trinity, try to rest and all will be o=
k...". Nightlight closed the cr and sat down close it
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: logomorph@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  S=
ent: Tuesday, March 20, 2001 9:03 PM
  Subject: Re: Trinity


  Trinity::

=
  From the loss of mech fluid, she felt extremely tired.  "I don't feel 
  =
very good." she said, starting to shake from being cold. "Is Aerotaur 
  an=
d Windlord ok? Are you ok? I don't want you guys getting hurt. I'm 
  tough=
, I can "shakes,"take it. I'm a pred you know."

  --- In nbwrpg@y..., airl=
y2000@y... wrote:
  > Nightlight::
  > 
  > "I'm fine" said Nightlight whil=
e she walked towards the base with 
  > Trinity in arms "And you little-gir=
l? Are you ok ???"
